import React, { useState } from "react"; // import { toast } from "react-toastify"; import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function Add_Products() { const hat = useNavigate() const [formValue, setFormValue] = useState({ cate_name: "", product_name: "", desc: "", price: "", discounted_price: "", img_url: "", created_at: "", }); const onChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormValue({ ...formValue, [name]: value, }); }; const onSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const response = await axios.post( `http://localhost:3000/${formValue.cate_name.toLowerCase()}`, formValue ); hat("/Manage_Casual_Outfits"); return (
